PageLove turns HTML into a full-stack application that:

stores

Stores

<data-store>

Save data straight in the HTML itself, not databases. No complex backend setup or API endpoints - your HTML becomes the storage layer.

Syncs

<sync-state>

Always updated in realtime through web sockets. Changes propagate instantly to all users without any additional infrastructure.

Thinks

<ai-ready>

AI has everything it needs to read, use, edit the page. No APIs needed - AI agents can directly interact with your HTML structure.
